verses.name: Matthew 18:31
verses.text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done, they were very sorry, and came and told unto their lord all that was done.

verses.name: Matthew 18:32
verses.text: Then his lord, after that he had called him, said unto him, O thou wicked servant, I forgave thee all that debt, because thou desiredst me:

verses.name: Matthew 18:33
verses.text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant, even as I had pity on thee?

verses.name: Matthew 18:34
verses.text: And his lord was wroth, and delivered him to the tormentors, till he should pay all that was due unto him.
